content: 24 more times 25 ribbed rounds total or until brim measures approx 4 or your desired length round 2 *k1 k2tog knit to 2 sts before marker ssk sm repeat from * 3 more times 8 stitches decreased 76 change to gauge needle sts remain with mc knit 6 rounds rounds 3 knit pattern round 1 with cc1 held double knit around round 4 repeat round 2 68 sts pattern round 2 with cc1 held double purl around round 5 knit pattern rounds 3-4 with mc knit around round 6 repeat round 2 60 sts pattern round 5 with cc1 held double k1 sl 1 pwise wyib around round 7 knit pattern round 6 with cc1 held double p1 sl1 pwise round 8 repeat round 2 52 sts wyib around round 9 knit pattern rounds 7-12 with mc knit around round 10-13 repeat round 2 you ll end round 13 with pattern round 13 with cc2 held double knit around 20 sts remaining pattern round 14 with cc2 held double purl around round 14 k2tog around 10 sts pattern rounds 15-18 with mc knit around break yarn thread through stitches and draw up to close fold ribbed brim to the inside of your hat with 36 tail pattern round 19 with cc2 held double sl 1 pwise remaining from cast on whip stitch the cast-on edge to the wyib k1 around top of the ribbed section to secure pattern round 20 with cc2 held double sl1 pwise wyib p1 around finishing pattern rounds 21-24 with mc knit around weave in ends if desired block and lay flat to dry pattern round 25 with cc2 held double knit around pattern round 26 with cc2 held double purl around pattern rounds 27-32 with mc knit around pattern round 33 with cc1 held double k1 sl 1 pwise wyib around pattern round 34 with cc1 held double p1 sl1 pwise wyib around pattern rounds 35-36 with mc knit around pattern round 37 with cc1 held double knit around 2 visit follow share visit us follow us
